body_html:
@alextp The issue here is not a question on SO. It's more a request for better documentation for TFRecords. This Issue here is the 4th hit on Google Search if you look for 'TFRecords'.
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/how_tos/reading_data/index.html has a exact grand total of 8 sentences on the topic of TFRecords.
It literally states it is The [Tensorflow] Standard Data Format, it would make sense to me to elaborate more on this topic with examples and good usage practices. And sure, the well documented API itself provides the tools, but does not touch upon the actual usage and power of TFRecords.
